title: Need an interview for a school project
body: Hello, im doing a school project and need a interview. I need to interview someone who works with the game so I would be really happy if someone from Riot responds to this. I need to be done with my project on May 1:st so i have a bit of time left but if soemone could respond as fast as posible so i can ask some questions that would be great.

replies.body: Hey add XJ9 i heard he does all the interviews he can get
yes m8, if you work for rito den what is the new champion
Legitimate question, why have you posted this on OCE boards instead of EUNE boards?
Im posting it on some different boards so i have a bigger chance of getting a answer
